Q.1. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED IN THE BRITISH ISLES*    1. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS   2. 6 MONTHS TO A YEAR   3. 1 YEAR TO 2 YEARS   4. OVER 2 YEARS 9 5. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.2. ARE YOU:    1. SINGLE   2. MARRIED   3. WIDOWED   4. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 8 5. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.3. CHECK THE ANSWER THAT TELLS BEST HOW FAR YOU WENT IN SCHOOL.    1. DID NOT FINISH GRADE SCHOOL   2. FINISHED GRADE SCHOOL   3. HAD SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT GRADUATE   4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL   5. HAD SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT GRADUATE   6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE   7. NO ANSWER
Q.4. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU HAVE OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE*    1. VERY FAVORABLE   2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE   3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE   4. VERY UNFAVORABLE   5. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.5A. HAS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE CHANGED FROM WHAT IT WAS BEFORE YOU CAME TO ENGLAND*    1. IT IS MUCH HIGHER THAN IT WAS   2. IT IS SOMEWHAT HIGHER THAN IT WAS   3. IT HAS NOT CHANGED ONE WAY OR THE OTHER   4. IT IS A BIT LOWER THAN IT WAS   5. IT IS MUCH LOWER THAN IT WAS   6. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.5B. IF IT HAS CHANGED WHAT DO YOU THINK CAUSED IT TO CHANGE*     . CLOSER ACQUAINTANCE    . FAVORABLE COMMENTS ON FRIENDLINESS, HOSPITALITY, ETC.    . ATTITUDE TOWARD AMERICAN SOLDIERS OR TREATMENT OF AMERICAN SOLDIERS    . CONDESCENDING, CONCEITED, SMUG, SNOOTY OR ETC.    . THEIR STANDARD OF LIVING    . UNFAVORABLE COMMENTS ON MORALS OF ENGLISH PEOPLE    . THEIR SYSTEM OF CLASS DISCRIMINATION    . ENGLISH PEOPLE,S PART IN THE WAR    . NO ANSWER TO Q.5B    . AMERICAN SOLDIERS, CONDUCT OF AMERICAN SOLDIERS    . MISCELLANEOUS    . "THE WAR" WITHOUT FURTHER EXPLANATION

Q.6. GENERALLY SPEAKING, WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU THINK MOST ENGLISH PEOPLE HAVE OF AMERICAN SOLDIERS*    1. VERY FAVORABLE   2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE   3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE   4. VERY UNFAVORABLE   5. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.7. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DID YOU HAVE OF ENGLISH PEOPLE BEFORE YOU CAME TO ENGLAND*    1. VERY FAVORABLE   2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE   3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE   4. VERY UNFAVORABLE   5. NO ANSWER
Q.8A. HOW MANY ENGLISH FAMILIES HAVE YOU GOTTEN TO KNOW*    1. NONE   2. ONE OR TWO   3. SEVERAL   4. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER   5. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.8E. HOW MANY ENGLISH CIVILIANS (OLDER MEN AND WOMEN)*    1. NONE   2. ONE OR TWO   3. SEVERAL   4. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER   5. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.9A. IN GENERAL, WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH FAMILIES YOU HAVE MET*    1. HAVEN,T MET ANY   2. THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME AS FAMILIES AT HOME   3. THEY ARE VERY DIFFERENT FROM FAMILIES AT HOME   4. NO ANSWER

Q.9B. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH SOLDIERS YOU HAVE MET*     . HAVEN,T MET ANY    . THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME, ETC.    . NO COMMENTS WRITTEN IN AND "THEY,RE VERY DIFFERENT" CHECKED    . RESERVED, SOBER, SERIOUS, MATURE, LESS BOASTFUL, ETC.    . MORE MILITARY, MORE STRICTLY OR EASILY DISCIPLINED    . UNFRIENDLY, SUPERIOR ATTITUDE    . JEALOUS OF AMERICAN SOLDIERS, OR ENVIOUS, OR DISLIKING AMERICANS    . COCKY, SELF-CENTERED, BRAGGING, EGOCENTRIC    . NO ANSWER AT ALL BY CHECK OR COMMENT    . FAVORABLE COMMENTS    . MISCELLANEOUS

Q.9C. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH GIRLS YOU HAVE MET*     . HAVEN,T MET ANY    . THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME    . NO COMMENT WRITTEN IN    . SERIOUS, RESERVED, MATURE    . UNFRIENDLY, CONDECENDING, SUPERIOR ATTITUDE    . IMMORAL, PROMISCUOUS    . FRIENDLY, SOCIABLE, CONGENIAL    . LESS INTELLIGENT, LESS EDUCATED, IGNORANT, SLOW IN UNDERSTANDING    . NO ANSWER AT ALL BY CHECK OR COMMENT    . SHY, BASHFUL    . MISCELLANEOUS    . IMMATURE, EASILY LED, UNSOPHISTICATED, DEPENDENT, "BELIEVE ANYTHING YOU SAY"

Q.9D. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE OLDER ENGLISH WOMEN YOU HAVE MET*    1. HAVEN,T MET ANY   2. THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME AS OLDER WOMEN AT HOME   3. THEY ARE VERY DIFFERENT FROM OLDER WOMEN AT HOME   5. NO ANSWER 5 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.9E. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH WORKING MEN YOU HAVE MET*    1. HAVEN,T MET ANY   2. THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH LIKE THE WORKING MEN IN THE UNITED STATES   3. THEY ARE VERY DIFFERENT FROM WORKING MEN IN THE STATES   4. NO ANSWER 6 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.10. HOW DID YOU FIRST MEET MOST OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE YOU KNOW*    1. USUALLY JUST GOT ACQUAINTED WITH THEM MYSELF ON A CHANCE MEETING   2. MET MOST OF THEM THROUGH A FRIEND WHO ALREADY KNEW THEM   3. MET MOST OF THEM BY INVITATION THROUGH ONE OF THE SERVICE ORGANIZATIONS   4. SOME OTHER WAY   5. NO ANSWER

Q.11. WHERE DID YOU FIRST MEET MOST OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE YOU KNOW*    1. JUST MET THEM AROUND TOWN   2. MET MOST OF THEM AT THEIR HOMES   3. MET MOST OF THEM AT DANCES   4. MET MOST OF THEM AT AN EATING PLACE OR PUB   5. SOME OTHER PLACE   6. NO ANSWER
Q.12. AS A WHOLE WHAT SORT OF A JOB DO YOU THINK THE ENGLISH PEOPLE HAVE BEEN DOING TOWARD THE WAR EFFORT*    1. VERY GOOD   2. FAIRLY GOOD   3. NOT VERY GOOD   4. NO ANSWER
Q.13. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE BRITISH SOLDIER STACKS UP AS A FIGHTING MAN*    1. VERY WELL   2. FAIRLY WELL   3. NOT VERY WELL   4. NOT WELL AT ALL   5. NO ANSWER

Q.14. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU THINK IT IS TO THE FUTURE WELL-BEING OF THE UNITED STATES THAT AMERICAN SOLDIERS GET ALONG WELL WITH THE ENGLISH PEOPLE*    1. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL   2. SOMEWHAT IMPORTANT   3. QUITE IMPORTANT   4. VERY IMPORTANT   5. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
